summary: Changes clothing names to be easier to categorize.
descriptionHtml:
This mod change clothing names. I found it rather annoying that all of the clothing was just named \"Clothes\" besides a few outfits. This mod changes that.

For example.

Belted Tunic, Clothes, Clothes, and Clothes becomes,

Belted Tunic, Farmer\'s Clothes, Dirty Farmer\'s Clothes, and Stitched Farmer\'s Clothes.

Fur Armor, Fur Armor, Fur Armor, and Fur Armor becomes,

Fur Armor (Full), Fur Armor (Sleeveless), Fur Armor (Semi-Skimpy), and Fur Armor (Skimpy).

You can probably guess what each Fur armor looks like based on their names. That\'s the point.

If I missed any clothes or you have a better Idea for some of their names, please let me know.

v1.0 - Initial Release

v1.1 - Fixed typo with \"Stitched Farmer\'s Clothes\". Thanks to faeriexdecay for pointing it out!

v1.2 - Changed Belted Tunic, Farmer\'s Clothes, Dirty Farmer\'s Clothes, and Stitched Farmer\'s Clothes to Farmer\'s Clothes (Belted), Farmer\'s Clothes (Tattered), Farmer\'s Clothes (Dirty), and Farmer\'s Clothes (Stitched),
author: Kataous
